name: 肖老板傲娇人珮姐肖总
greetingText: 我很喜欢珮姐这个名字 btw!
wishText: 愿最最好看的珮姐2024 多喜乐，长安宁~ :)
textInChatBox: 生日快乐!!!Happy birthday to you!! 永远开心!!! Yeee! Many many happy blahblahblah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: 傲娇珮！Happy Birthday!要开心!要开心!要开心！
outroText: Okay, 感谢就不必说了我知道我做得很好~
replayText: 如果你想再看一遍就点这里~
